title: Mandatory OGTA Training and Leave Policy Roundtable Updates
summary: The newsletter highlights mandatory training under the Open Government Training Act (OGTA) for fire departments, emphasizing separation of responsibilities between administration and governance. It also announces an upcoming roundtable on leave policies targeting upper management.
